name: Bookshelf
description: Supports several different metadata providers and options for organizing your collection.

name: LDAP Authentication
description:
Authenticate your Jellyfin users against an LDAP database, and optionally create users who do not yet exist automatically.

Allows the administrator to customize most aspects of the LDAP authentication process, including customizable search attributes, username attribute, and a search filter for administrative users (set on user creation). The user, via the "Manual Login" process, can enter any va
